original_text: And they were both righteous before God, walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless.
korean_text: 이 두 사람이 하나님 앞에 의인이니 주의 모든 계명과 규례대로 흠이 없이 행하더라

sentences.original_text: And they were both righteous before God
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 둘 다 하나님 앞에서 의로웠다

sentences.original_text: walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord
